div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1869 Mathura, c. 130 km. S of New Delhi, (664) Uttar Pradesh, India, c. 1853 Burial: 1st cent. B.C. (Le Rider) Contents: 183 AR Strato II: 96 dr. Rajuvala: 87 dr. Disposition: A. Cunningham and E. Tho- mas Cunningham, JASB 1854, pp. 690-1, illus.; NC 1870, p. 215 and note 1 Prinsep, Essays on Indian Antiquities 2 (London, 1858), p. 197, note 1 Cunningham (NC 1870) reports 183 coins in his text but according to his note the find comprised only 134 coins
